parameters.description: Filter parameter: get only records newer than the provided id

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Filter parameter: define the order you want to receive the records (does not affect older/newer behaviour). Valid values are asc or desc.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Filter parameter: define the amount of records sent per call (max 50)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Only return collections that have been featured on Product Hunt. true or false. Default = false.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Filter parameter: valid values are created_at, updated_at or featured_at

parameters.description: The background image of the collection. Recommended: width: 1250px, height: 250px.

parameters.description: The color of the collection. Valid values are: brown,red,blue,light_green,green

parameters.name: newer
parameters.description: Filter parameter: get only records with newer "start_at" date (includes events with unspeficifed date) than the provided date (format "YYYY-MM-DD")

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Filter parameter: define the amount of records to be skipped

parameters.name: older
parameters.description: Filter parameter: get only records with older "start_at" date than the provided date (format "YYYY-MM-DD")

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Filter parameter: define the amount of records sent per call (default 20, max 50)

parameters.description: Retrieve events for a specific month (format "YYYY-MM"), use "false" for events without a start_at date

parameters.name: include

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Filter parameter: define the amount of records sent per call (max 50)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Type of reference object accepted, defaults to 'Post', use 'all' for every notification type

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The id of your application

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: Where shall we redirect the client afterwards to?

parameters.name: response_type
parameters.description: The parameter name of the request token that will be passed to your site, in case of doubt use `code`

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: If you only require public information you want to use `public`. If you need private information of the logged-in user go with `public private`. If you have write access and want to update user information you also need `public private`

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The id of your application

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: The secret of your application

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The access grant code you received via the callback from the previous step

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: use `client_credentials`

parameters.description: Where shall we redirect the client afterwards to?

parameters.name: send_announcement_email
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive emails when there is a new Product Hunt announcement? true or false

parameters.name: send_announcement_push
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive push notifications when there is a new Product Hunt announcement? true or false

parameters.name: send_friend_post_email
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive emails when a friend posts a product? true or false

parameters.name: send_friend_post_push
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive push notifications when a friend posts a product? true or false

parameters.name: send_mention_email
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive emails when mentioned in comments? true or false

parameters.name: send_mention_push
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive push notifications when mentioned in comments? true or false

parameters.name: send_new_follower_email
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive emails when they get a new follower? true or false

parameters.name: send_new_follower_push
parameters.description: Does the user want to receive push notifications when they get a new follower? true or false

parameters.name: send_product_recommendation_email
parameters.description: Does the user want to recieve product recommendations via email (popular products, similar interests)? true or false

parameters.name: send_product_recommendation_push
parameters.description: Does the user want to recieve product recommendations via push (popular products, similar interests)? true or false

parameters.name: subscribed_to_push
parameters.description: Is the user subscribed to receiving push notifications? true or false
